articles.description: By Gabriela Baczynska BRUSSELS (Reuters) – The European Union’s COVID-19 certificates “must prevent discrimination” of those not vaccinated and will also include information on tests and recovery, according to a draft document seen by Reuters ahead of publica…
articles.title: EU COVID-19 certificates ‘must prevent discrimination’: draft By Reuters - Up News Info
